additionalProperty.name: Name of this additionalProperty
additionalProperty.value: Value of this additional Property - text, number, etc

aggregateRating.reviewAspect: Text describing what part of the CreativeWork is subject to the ratings here

audience.audienceType: The category of the audience - oceanographers, artists, etc
audience.name: The name - if any - of the intended audience

geographicArea.name: The name of the geographic area within which the audience is found

award: name of award won by this product
name of another award won by this product

model.description: Text to describe the model of the product.
model.gtin13: text code: The GTIN-13 code of the product, equivalent to 13-digit ISBN codes
model.name: text model name of product

mpn: text to state the Manufacturer Part Number (MPN) of the product

itemListElement.name: First negative point to consider regarding this product eg. expensive.
Second negative point to consider regarding this product eg. quite heavy material.

nsn: Text to state the NATO stock number of the product

itemListElement.name: First negative point to consider regarding this product eg. tougher and water resistant design.
Second negative point to consider regarding this product eg. solid feel.

review.reviewBody: The actual body of the review.

size.minValue: Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similar Unicode symbols.
size.maxValue: Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similar Unicode symbols.
size.value: Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similar Unicode symbols.

sku: merchant-specific identifier for a product or service, or the product to which the offer refers.
slogan: A slogan or motto associated with the item.

weight.minValue: Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similar Unicode symbols.
weight.maxValue: Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similar Unicode symbols.
weight.value: Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similar Unicode symbols.

width.minValue: Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similar Unicode symbols.
width.maxValue: Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similar Unicode symbols.
width.value: Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similar Unicode symbols.

description: Free text or a URL to a description of this Thing.
disambiguatingDescription: A sub property of description. A short description of the item used to disambiguate from other, similar items. Information from other properties (in particular, name) may be necessary for the description to be useful for disambiguation
